            ASSOCIATED WITH THE TRUST FUND FOR EAST TIM,TF050894-TFET- PETROLEUM TECHNICAL

abstracts.cdata!:
Ratings for the Timor-Leste First and
            Second Petroleum Technical Assistance Projects were both as
            follows: outcomes were satisfactory, the risk to development
            outcome was moderate, the Bank performance was satisfactory,
            and the Borrower performance was satisfactory. The Projects
            demonstrate the important role that just-in-time assistance
            can play in helping countries develop their extractive
            industry resources (i.e., oil, gas, and mining). It is
            critical that developing countries bring expert assistance
            to bear as they negotiate the development of such resources
            with international companies and/or developed countries that
            have highly-qualified technical staff, lawyers, and
            negotiators, to ensure that resources are developed in a
            manner that benefits the country.
